channel.title: 667 Issues
channel.description:
Hello, in this thread I'll put some issues I need to solve and I hope you guys can help me out ;)
Info: Using OptimusScape V1 / Disturbed
1. Hiscores: am having trouble with my hiscores, when the player logs the stats get saved on mysql database on the phpadmin page thing, but when I go to: http://localhost/highscores.php the stats doesen't appear neither the players, I really don't know whats wrong. (Am testing it on localhost, cause when I used my no-ip, I could not connect to mysql database (portfoward to be done)
EDIT:Oh yeah, and how can I make the Admins not to appear on Hiscores :P
2. Magic: am having a anoying issue cause to use an spell (e.g ice barrage) I need to auto-cast, If I just click "cast" it wont work.
3. Custom Tab: How can my custom tab update every single time a new player logs in o when you get a kill? I have players online, but I wont update when a player log in or log out. Same with Kills and Death "spots", it only updates when you re-log.
4. Equiptment reqs: am trying to add a Spawn that you actually need to be wearing Diving Apparatus & fishbowl helmet, but I want that the object you are clicking to dive ask for those two items to be wearing.
5. PackingNpcs: anyone got a tut link for Packing NPCSDefenitions?
6. Global objects: how can I make items spawns for everyone. What I mean is that if I drop something It appear to the rest of the people.
And I think thats it. Thank you very much, I really hope for some help from you guys :3
Cheers!

item.title: 667 Issues
item.dc:creator: @sk8rdude461 sk8rdude461
item.description:
@sk8rdude461 wrote:

Well you need to see what configurations, if any, are blocking those ports.

Read full topic

item.title: 667 Issues
item.dc:creator: @Arkamys Arkamys
item.description:
@Arkamys wrote:

Don’t even have Skype Running ;D

Read full topic

item.title: 667 Issues
item.dc:creator: @sk8rdude461 sk8rdude461
item.description:
@sk8rdude461 wrote:

If you have skype running, that’s why. Make skype use an alternate port

Read full topic

item.title: 667 Issues
item.dc:creator: @Arkamys Arkamys
item.description:
@Arkamys wrote:

[quote=“sk8rdude461, post:6, topic:521471”]3306 is the MySQL port.
Try turning off Wamp/Xampp/etc then port forwarding.
Also if all else fails. You only need to port forward port 80, and the just connect to the php file.
Anyways, what’s the hiscores.php look like[/quote]

As I told you everytime I try to checkport on 3306, appears that: "Could not test port 3306 because some other applications has that port locked.
That happens also with port 80

Read full topic

item.title: 667 Issues
item.dc:creator: @sk8rdude461 sk8rdude461
item.description:
@sk8rdude461 wrote:

3306 is the MySQL port.
Try turning off Wamp/Xampp/etc then port forwarding.
Also if all else fails. You only need to port forward port 80, and the just connect to the php file.
Anyways, what’s the hiscores.php look like

Read full topic

item.title: 667 Issues
item.dc:creator: @Arkamys Arkamys
item.description:
@Arkamys wrote:

Any suggestions?

The connection is on localhost, cause when I portfoward to my no-ip I doesen’t create the connection.

I used the portchecker to port 3306 and it appears that other app is using that port.

Read full topic

item.title: 667 Issues
item.dc:creator: @sk8rdude461 sk8rdude461
item.description:
@sk8rdude461 wrote:

So it saves to the database, but your php file doesn’t load it?
Sounds like something is up with the connection to the database.

Read full topic

item.title: 667 Issues
item.dc:creator: @Arkamys Arkamys
item.description:
@Arkamys wrote:

[quote=“sk8rdude461, post:2, topic:521471”]Lets take this 1 at a time.
For issue 1. Is it actually saving to the database or no?[/quote]

Yes.

Read full topic

item.title: 667 Issues
item.dc:creator: @Arkamys Arkamys
item.description:
@Arkamys wrote:

Hello, in this thread I’ll put some issues I need to solve and I hope you guys can help me out

Info: Using OptimusScape V1 / Disturbed

  1. Hiscores: am having trouble with my hiscores, when the player logs the stats get saved on mysql database on the phpadmin page thing, but when I go to: http://localhost/highscores.php the stats doesen’t appear neither the players, I really don’t know whats wrong. (Am testing it on localhost, cause when I used my no-ip, I could not connect to mysql database (portfoward to be done)

EDIT:Oh yeah, and how can I make the Admins not to appear on Hiscores

  1. Magic: am having a anoying issue cause to use an spell (e.g ice barrage) I need to auto-cast, If I just click “cast” it wont work.

  2. Custom Tab: How can my custom tab update every single time a new player logs in o when you get a kill? I have players online, but I wont update when a player log in or log out. Same with Kills and Death “spots”, it only updates when you re-log.

  3. Equiptment reqs: am trying to add a Spawn that you actually need to be wearing Diving Apparatus & fishbowl helmet, but I want that the object you are clicking to dive ask for those two items to be wearing.

  4. PackingNpcs: anyone got a tut link for Packing NPCSDefenitions?

  5. Global objects: how can I make items spawns for everyone. What I mean is that if I drop something It appear to the rest of the people.

And I think thats it. Thank you very much, I really hope for some help from you guys :3

Cheers!
